# Function name: cat
# Notes:
# .blue[`cat()`]
.center[.blue[`cat`]`(*things*)`]
.pull-left-60[
+ .blue[`cat()`] is simpler version of the .blue[`paste()`] function.
  + It does not print the vector position, like [1].
  + It does not prints a slash before quotes.
+ The .blue[`glue::glue()`] is an excellent alternative.
]
.pull-right-36[
```{r}
cat("The cyberman", "cried.")
cat('The cyberman said "error."')
words <- "Hi Mom"
cat("Ray said ", '"', words, '".')
```
]
---
